column1: '''Robbie Magasiva''' ([[1972]]) is a New Zealand actor, part of the comedy group [[wikipedia:Naked Samoans
column2: Naked Samoans]]. He played [[Mauhúr]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''.
That was only 30 seconds of nastiness. I want two hours' worth of nastiness on the big screen.
column3: Robbie Magasiva on playing Mauhúr, [http://www.listener.co.nz/issue/3442/features/5970/robbie_magasiva.html ''New Zealand Listener'' interview]}}
